name: The Manor Of Pleasure
description: Hey, you didn't fought it was possible ? But it is. Do you need some recreation ? Here it is. The Manor Of Pleasure has been brought to you as a strange kind of training. Quite many pretty girls are waiting for you, and sometimes some of them may call you for a kiss. Don't disappoint them, try to stay alive and kill all your enemies to win their gratitude and thanks. But, do not think that this mission will be easy to complete, enemies are rather powerfull and numerous, they will not leave you a second to take your breath.
